claiming errors > create binary market ok

testcase.name: gating market creation > err-expecting-merkle-root-for-poll
gating market creation > err-unauthorised
gating market creation > ensure bme022 is valid extension
gating market creation > can call set-merkle-root via proposal
gating market creation > can't call create-market with invalid merkle lookup key
gating market creation > deployer can create-market if dao bootstrapped
